percentile_basis.note: Thresholds based on 5th percentile of 1,530 real Atari 2600 games

patterns_detected.tia_analysis: Zero page addressing (82.1% expected), absolute addressing (4.7% expected)
patterns_detected.riot_analysis: Timer access ($80-$87, 78% expected), I/O access ($94-$97, 22% expected)
patterns_detected.instruction_distribution: STA 71.8%, STX 9.3%, STY 8.5%, LDA 6.7% expected for TIA
